info: CVE-2020-1472: Netlogon Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
description: This vulnerability allows an attacker to elevate their privileges on Windows Server systems.
remediation: Apply the Microsoft patch for CVE-2020-1472 to mitigate this vulnerability.

info: CVE-2017-0144: EternalBlue SMBv1 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: This vulnerability exploits the SMBv1 protocol and can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable Windows system.
remediation: Disable SMBv1 or apply the patch provided by Microsoft.

info: CVE-2018-8174: Microsoft Internet Explorer VBScript Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability in Internet Explorerâ€™s VBScript engine could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
remediation: Upgrade to a more recent version of Internet Explorer or Microsoft Edge and apply the security update.
